page.title: 15The Media in Chorley
page.content: In our area of Chorley we get quite a lot of radio stations which come from other parts of Lancashire.We can receive radio 1,2,3 and4. Also we receive Red Rose Radio which is broadcast from Preston ( a large town 10 miles to the North of Chorley. We also receive Radio Lancashire which is broadcast from Blackburn ( a town 10 miles N.E of Chorley). The main newspaper in Chorley is the Chorley Guardian. This is a weekly paper and cost 25p. The free papers are The Town Crier and Chorley Trader. The most popular evening paper is the Lancashire Evening Post which is printed in Preston and on sale every evening except Sunday.
